results.title: Simvastatin in the treatment of hypercholesterolaemia in patients with essential hypertension.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ in the treatment of hypercholesterolaemia in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Essential_Tremor</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020329 @@@essential@@@ @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@.

citations.NLM: Morgan T, Anderson A, McDonald P, Hopper J, Macaskill G. Simvastatin in the treatment of hypercholesterolaemia in patients with essential hypertension. J Hypertens Suppl. 1990 Mar;8(1):S25-30; discussion S30-2. PMID: 2332814

results.title: Anti-inflammatory effects of simvastatin in patients with chronic heart failure.
results.text_hl: Proinflammatory markers were evaluated in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with chronic @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@ of @DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@ischemic@@@ origin and @<m>DISEASE_Essential_Tremor</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020329 @@@essential@@@ @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ with preserved left-ventricular ejection fraction before and after a 6-month course of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ therapy (20 mg/day).

citations.NLM: Pinchuk TV, Fedulaev YN, Khairetdinova GA, Denisova NN, Chura OV, Logunova IY. Anti-inflammatory effects of simvastatin in patients with chronic heart failure. Bull Exp Biol Med. 2014 Sep;157(5):552-4. PMID: 25257410
